snippet.title: Sorry We're Closed - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Watch the latest trailer for Sorry We're Closed to see gameplay and the creepy creatures of this upcoming single-player survival horror game. Sorry We're Closed features classic fixed camera angles and arcade style first-person combat. Enter the perilous demon world, collecting items and managing your resources to stay alive. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets, and solve puzzles. With only a few days of freedom left, Michelle needs to find answers. Why has a dangerous and powerful demon placed a curse on her? And what can she do to save her own precious skin? Sorry We're Closed is coming to PC, and a demo is available now on Steam.
